  • All Classes

Package com.vmware.vcenter.lcm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Install
    The service to install Embedded VCSA, PSC, Management VCSA, VMC gateway.
    InstallTypes
    Defines the data types of the Install API service.
    Log
    The service that provides logs associated with a task of a given task ID.
    LogTypes
    Defines the data types of the Log API service.
    Migrate
    The service to migrate a windows VC to Embedded VCSA, PSC, and Management VCSA.
    MigrateTypes
    Defines the data types of the Migrate API service.
    Recommendation
    The service that provide recommendation.
    RecommendationTypes
    Defines the data types of the Recommendation API service.
    Upgrade
    The service to upgrade an existing appliance to Embedded VCSA, PSC, and Management VCSA.
    UpgradeTypes
    Defines the data types of the Upgrade API service.
    Validation
    The service that provides validation of a section of full deployment specification.
    ValidationTypes
    Defines the data types of the Validation API service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplianceSize
    The size of appliance to be deployed.
    ApplianceType
    The type of appliance to be deployed.

    The SSO definition that only contains CEIP setting.
